description: Your team has recieved a report of an exposed S3 bucket. All objects in the bucket are accessible via anonymous requests.

choices.description: Do nothing. We get reports like this. Most of the time they're nothing concerning.
choices.impact: It turns out there was customer data in that bucket that led to a breach and a total cost of $9 million for the company, and there was no budget to cover.
The bucket had static website data (images, javascript, etc) for a public site. Nothing to worry about
